aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.paragraph1: I'm Pablo, Argentine, born on August 12th, 1988 on Buenos Aires. Now, living in Balneário Camboriú, in the state of Santa Catarina, Brazil, since the beginning of 2022. I moved here in search of new objectives and looking for an improvement in the quality of life that BC offers.
aboutUs.paragraph2: I'm a Front-End Dev, passionate about personal and professional growth and development in the IT world. Responsible, self-taught, proactive, determined and restless are the qualities that characterize me. I like to work as a team mate so that learning will be faster and shared.
aboutUs.paragraph3: I've been working as a freelance developer since 2019 and I use technologies such as ReactJS, Javascript, Bootstrap, JQuery, CSS3, HTML5; GitHub for version control and collaborative work; and Firebase. I also manage tools related to digital marketing such as Google Ads, Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics.
